entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Thunder Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:14 a.m. EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Thunder Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:21 a.m. EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 1.0Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thunder Bay Airport 3:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 1.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: -1.0°C
Wind: N 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to periods of freezing rain after midnight. Periods of rain near Lake Superior. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 8:22 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Ice pellets or freezing rain. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to ice pellets in the morning. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning and early afternoon. Periods of rain near Lake Superior early in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:22 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to snow at times heavy and local blowing snow in the evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 8:22 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023
